commit_messages.message: docs: add voice console refactor documentation
refactor: voice console with state machine architecture
fix: voice console - remove duplicate stop() function and improve female voice selection
feat: Emma System Enhancement - daily sync, voice console improvements, unified voice output
fix: correct forceLearningCycle import in EmmaLearning - Moved forceLearningCycle import from EmmaCore to selfLearner - Function is exported from selfLearner.mjs, not EmmaCore.mjs
fix: remove smart quote from memoryCore.mjs line 266 - Changed What's to What\'s (escaped apostrophe) - Dev server now running clean on port 3001

fix: resolve syntax errors in memoryCore, fusionRunner, vite.config - Fixed smart quotes/commas in memoryCore.mjs line 274 - Updated fusionRunner.js to use fetchGeminiAnalysis from geminiClient - Fixed Google Drive API endpoints in vite.config.js (proper middleware pattern) - Dev server running clean on port 3000

feat(emma): Google Drive integration with personal + work accounts - googleapis@118.0.0 SDK integration - Backend endpoints: /api/google-drive/status, /api/google-drive/sync - GoogleDriveSync React component in Emma Learning dashboard - googleDriveConfig.js: Credentials, folder structure, OAuth config - googleDriveLinker.js: Drive operations (link, find, sync, upload) - setupEmmaFolders.js: Folder creation script with core instructions - getGoogleTokens.js: OAuth token generator helper - .env.local.example: Environment variable template - Emma folder structure: KnowledgeBase, Instructions, Dictionaries, Logs, Archives - Supports both ashraf.kahoush@gmail.com (personal) and ashraf@ahkstrategies.net (work) - Daily auto-sync with realtime instruction updates
feat(pilot): Clients layer + ingestion + Command Pad + Fusion + Reports
feat(emma): Emma v5 Self-Learning Intelligence + Full Autonomy
fix(emma): Resolve Vite compilation errors completely
fix(emma): Resolve Vite parsing errors
feat(emma): Add Self-Learning Rules 11 & 12 - Continuous Improvement
feat(emma): Memory Core + Foundational Ground Rules
feat(emma): Intelligence Core - Context Awareness + Notifications + Proactive Mode
feat(emma): Quick Actions Bar - floating bubbles for instant commands
feat(emma): Learning Mode - AI memory and proactive suggestions
feat(emma): Avatar & Mood System - animated expressions and particle effects
feat(emma): Emma Masterpiece v5 - vocabulary, reports archive, personality enhancements
fix(voice): add close button, prevent loop, female TTS, read-report command
